titles.title: National Guard and Reservists Financial Relief Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently allow penalty-free withdrawals from retirement plans for individuals called to active duty for at least 179 days.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/15/2007--Introduced. National Guard and Reservists Financial Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the exemption from tax penalties for premature distributions from retirement plans by members of the National Guard or Ready Reserve called to active duty.
